snippet: A decline in the company’s movie business was somewhat offset by a slight rise in sales in its television network group.
abstract: Viacom media group reports 5.1 percent decrease in profit in latest fiscal quarter; total revenue tumbled 7 percent to $3.4 billion for three months that ended on June 30, compared with same period in 2013; quarterly earnings of $610 million, or $1.40 a share, missed analyst expectations.
lead_paragraph: A decline in the company’s movie business was somewhat offset by a slight rise in sales in its television network group.

headline.main: Revenue and Profits Drop at Viacom
headline.print_headline: Revenue and Profits Drop at Viacom
